HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Update 2.4.0
ARoM updated to support RimWorld version 1.1.
New Classes: o Commander - a charismatic leader dedicated to coordinating the efforts of their allies. o Super Soldier - an adept soldier able to perform combat techniques that require enhanced physical constitution, strength, and dexterity.
Tweaks: o Paladin abilities have been improved slightly to bring the class more inline with other classes.
--See mod discord announcements for all the details on tweaks and bug fixes! - https://discord.gg/ksksHj --
